price: Muri ryo (Ijuru) nta magambo adafite akamaro cyangwa se ayatuma bakora ibyaha bazumvamo,
arabic: لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغۡوٗا وَلَا تَأۡثِيمًا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: lā yasmaʿūna fīhā laghwan walā tathīman
